Name: Pearl Button
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade.
Review: Cachaça, aromatised wine, and citrus combine in this dry, refreshing drink.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2013 by John Deragon at PDT , New York City, USA. John's original recipe calls for San Pellegrino Limonata in place of lemonade.
Nutrition: One serving of Pearl Button contains 175 calories
